title: Using an attribute selector, how would you select an <a> element with a “title” attribute?
What is the line-height property primarily used for?
answer_1: to control the height of the space between two lines of content
answer_2: to control the height of the space between heading elements
answer_3: to control the height of the character size
answer_4: to control the width of the space between characters
right_answer: to control the height of the space between two lines of content

title: Three of these choices are true about class selectors. Which is NOT true?
answer_1: Multiple classes can be used within the same element.
answer_2: The same class can be used multiple times per page.
answer_3: Class selectors with a leading period
answer_4: Classes can be used multiple times per page but not within the same element.
right_answer: Classes can be used multiple times per page but not within the same element.

title: Classes can be used multiple times per page but not within the same element.
answer_1: the closest element with position: relative
